member.name: T:Faker.Beer
member.summary: A collection of Beer related generator tasks.

member.name: M:Faker.Beer.Alcohol
member.summary: Generates a random alcohol percentage between 2.0 and 10.0

member.name: M:Faker.Beer.Hop
member.summary: Generates a random hop type

member.name: M:Faker.Beer.IBU
member.summary: Generates a random IBU (Bitterness of the beer)
member.remarks: Description of IBU is at

member.name: M:Faker.Beer.Malt
member.summary: Generates a random beer malt type

member.summary: Generates a random Beer Name

member.summary: Generates a random Beer Style

member.summary: Generates a random yeast type

member.summary: Gets a random FlatHash.com image URL.
member.param: The optional slug to use instead of generating a new random slug.

member.name: T:Faker.Address
member.summary: A collection of address related resources.
member.remarks: The resources are acquired by satellite assemblies matching the current thread's . If no matching satellite assembly is found, the english version is used.

member.name: M:Faker.Address.BuildingNumber
member.summary: Gets a random building number.

member.name: M:Faker.Address.City
member.summary: Gets a random city.

member.name: M:Faker.Address.CityPrefix
member.summary: Gets a random city prefix.

member.name: M:Faker.Address.CitySuffix
member.summary: Gets a random city suffix.

member.name: M:Faker.Address.Country
member.summary: Gets a random country.

member.name: M:Faker.Address.CountryCode
member.summary: Gets a random country code.

member.name: M:Faker.Address.DefaultCountry
member.summary: Gets the default country.

member.name: M:Faker.Address.Latitude
member.summary: Gets a random latitude coordinate.

member.name: M:Faker.Address.Longitude
member.summary: Gets a random longitude coordinate.

member.name: M:Faker.Address.SecondaryAddress
member.summary: Gets a random secondary address.

member.name: M:Faker.Address.State
member.summary: Gets a random state.

remarks.note: If the selected Culture doesn't have states, this will output a Random Country instead.

member.name: M:Faker.Address.StateAbbreviation
member.summary: Gets a random state abbreviation.

remarks.note: If the selected Culture doesn't have states, this will output a Random Country Abbreviation instead.

member.name: M:Faker.Address.StreetAddress
member.summary: Gets a random street address, without a Secondary address.
member.returns: A random street address, without a secondary address.

member.name: M:Faker.Address.StreetAddress(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a random street address.
member.param: if set to include secondary address.

member.summary: Gets the name of a random street.
member.returns: The name of a random street.

member.summary: Gets a random street suffix.

member.name: T:Faker.Caching.PropertyHelper
member.summary: This class helps to shorten code to return method PropertyInfo.
member.remarks: The code is inspired by and edited to address the static class with static method case.

member.name: M:Faker.Caching.PropertyHelper.GetProperty``1(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0}})
member.summary: Extracts the Property Information for the member selector
member.param: The lambda expression to extract property from

member.name: T:Faker.Caching.ResourceCollectionCacher
member.summary: This class caches resource items containing collections of strings, separated by a separator.
member.remarks: It returns the split array reducing complexity from O(n) to O(1). The class is thread-safe.

member.name: M:Faker.Caching.ResourceCollectionCacher.GetArray(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Gets the cached array (with O(1) complexity) in cache-hit case. In cache-miss case, invokes the property, splits, caches, and returns the array (with O(n) complexity).
member.remarks: The cache is indexed by the class holding the property, the property name and the current UI culture name.

member.name: M:Faker.Caching.ResourceCollectionCacher.Clear
member.summary: Used just for testing purposes

member.name: T:Faker.RandomNumber
member.summary: Provides access to random number generator.
member.remarks: This is just a convenience class and is just wrapping .

revisionHistory.revision: Renamed previously named max variable to to be consistent with the Random.Next(Int32) method.
Renamed previously named min and max variable to and to be consistent with the Random.Next(Int32,Int32) method.
Renamed previously named seed to to be consistent with the constructor.
